resume: Soon after being taken in by a loving new mother and father, two young former orphans do their best to keep their furry, four-legged friend — a loveable Great Dane named Chestnut — a secret from their adoptive parents and save him from a grim fate at the city pound.<ref namehttp://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/chestnut-hero-of-central-park/ |titleRotten Tomatoes |date2012-06-18}}
